thread.title: Oakland Raiders at San Diego Chargers: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online
thread.title_full: Oakland Raiders at San Diego Chargers: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online | OregonLive.com

author: Geoffrey C. Arnold | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Oakland Raiders at San Diego Chargers: Start time, what TV channel, how to watch live stream online
text:
If the Oakland Raiders are going to snap a two-game losing streak and have any realistic chance of earning a playoff berth, they need to defeat San Diego Sunday afternoon (1:25 p.m. ET/4:25 p.m. ET, (no local broadcast, watch live broadcast on DirecTV's Sunday Ticket or live stream on DirecTV's live stream) .
The Raiders are coming off a bye week and have had two weeks to prepare for the Chargers. They have been hurt by turnovers in the last two losses, with a combined five giveaways in those two games.
The Raiders expect running back Latavious Murray to return after he missed part of the loss to Denver in Week 5. He could exploit a Chargers unit that is ranked 27th in rushing defense. The Raiders also plan to challenge Chargers CB Brandon Flowers, who has struggled in coverage this season.
Chargers quarterback Philip Rivers completed 43 passes and threw for 503 yards and two touchdowns in a 27-20 loss to Green Bay last week. Rivers is on pace to break Drew Brees' single-season completion record and Peyton Manning's record for passing yards. Rivers is salivating at the opportunity to throw against a Raiders defense that is allowing 299 passing yards a game.
The problem for the Chargers is they are one-dimensional on offense. They are ranked first in passing in the NFL, but 26th in rushing.
If you want to watch the Raiders play at San Diego, here's what you need to know:
What : Oakland Raiders at San Diego Chargers
Where : Qualcomm Stadium, San Diego, CA
When : Sunday, Oct. 25, 1:05 p.m. PT/4:05 p.m. ET
TV : No local broadcast. You can watch game on DirecTV's Sunday Ticket package
Watch online : You can watch the live stream online on DirecTV's live stream package.
-- Geoffrey C. Arnold | @geoffreyCarnold
